products.unbrandedName: Hyacinth House Fuschia Brushstrokes Aurora Midi Dress
products.description: Hyacinth House represents classic femininity while edging on the side of flirty, bohemian, and playful. Through vibrant florals, textured ruffles, and bold patterns, the collection inspires women to embrace their romantic and whimsical side, seeking adventure, excitement, and celebration. The perfect piece to make sure you stay cool and stylish at summer parties, there is no style quite like the Fuschia Brushstrokes Aurora Midi Dress. With a beautiful floral print, we love this midi's unique U-shaped halter neckline that ties behind the neck and its twirl-worthy tiered skirt. Crafted from soft, slightly textured cotton, this is the ideal silhouette for sunny celebrations and elevated events this season. Just pair with wedges and a clutch to let this spectacular style be the center of attention! Keyhole neck Short sleeves Pulls over 100% ramie Embroidery: 100% polyester Slip: 100% modal Machine wash Imported SIZE & FIT About 55.25" from shoulder to hem Model measurements: 5'10" tall Model is wearing a US size Small ABOUT THE BRAND In 2002, rag & bone founder Marcus Wainwright combined his British heritage with a downtown-New York aesthetic to set the tone for the label. At the heart of the edgy-yet-laid-back brand is its focus on quality craftsmanship and attention to detail. The epitome of cool, off-duty style, it's no wonder the signature second-skin denim is favored by many. Contemporary Sportswear - Rag And Bone > Rag & Bone > Saks Fifth Avenue > Barneys. rag & bone. Color: White. Size: XXS.
